name: Necromancer Tomb
description:
Main Goal:

  • Explore procedurally generated dungeon
  • Unlock a special ability for your class
  • Defeat the boss at the end of the dungeon
  • Stay alive!

Classes:

  • Wizard
  • Knight
  • Archer

Controls:

MovementWASDBasic AttackLeft Mouse Button
Special AttackRight Mouse ButtonHealHPause GameEscape Button

Tips:

  • In order to unlock the special ability defeat different types of enemies and acquire their relics
  • Purchase "Shard of Power" from the Wandering Merchant after obtaining all of the required materials
  • Regenerate your HP by standing on a healing zone
  • Move swiftly and accordingly to avoid incoming projectiles

This game was made as a project for a University course in game development. Therefore, the game itself is in its early alpha version with only core mechanics implemented.

Any and all feedback, game-dev tips, bug identification is greatly appreciated!
